description: Returns information about one or more Amazon Lightsail SSL/TLS certificates.

parameters.name: certificateStatuses
parameters.description: The status of the certificates for which to return information. For example, specify ISSUED to return only certificates with an ISSUED status. When omitted, the response includes all of your certificates in the Amazon Web Services Region where the request is made, regardless of their current status. (string) ---

parameters.name: includeCertificateDetails
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include detailed information about the certificates in the response. When omitted, the response includes only the certificate names, Amazon Resource Names (ARNs), domain names, and tags.

parameters.name: certificateName
parameters.description: The name for the certificate for which to return information. When omitted, the response includes all of your certificates in the Amazon Web Services Region where the request is made.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The token to advance to the next page of results from your request. To get a page token, perform an initial GetCertificates request. If your results are paginated, the response will return a next page token that you can specify as the page token in a subsequent request.

nested_items.name: certificates
nested_items.description: An object that describes certificates.

nested_items.name: certificateArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate.

nested_items.name: certificateName
nested_items.description: The name of the certificate.

nested_items.name: domainName
nested_items.description: The domain name of the certificate.

nested_items.name: certificateDetail
nested_items.description: An object that describes a certificate in detail.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the certificate ( my-certificate).

nested_items.name: domainName
nested_items.description: The domain name of the certificate.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The validation status of the certificate.

nested_items.name: serialNumber
nested_items.description: The serial number of the certificate.

nested_items.name: subjectAlternativeNames
nested_items.description: An array of strings that specify the alternate domains ( example2.com) and subdomains ( blog.example.com) of the certificate.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: domainValidationRecords
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describe the domain validation records of the certificate.

nested_items.name: domainName
nested_items.description: The domain name of the certificate validation record. For example, example.com or www.example.com.

nested_items.name: resourceRecord
nested_items.description: An object that describes the DNS records to add to your domain's DNS to validate it for the certificate.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the record.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The DNS record type.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value for the DNS record.

nested_items.name: dnsRecordCreationState
nested_items.description: An object that describes the state of the canonical name (CNAME) records that are automatically added by Lightsail to the DNS of the domain to validate domain ownership.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The status code for the automated DNS record creation.
SUCCEEDED - The validation records were successfully added to the domain.
STARTED - The automatic DNS record creation has started.
FAILED - The validation records failed to be added to the domain.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The message that describes the reason for the status code.

nested_items.name: validationStatus
nested_items.description: The validation status of the record.

nested_items.name: requestFailureReason
nested_items.description: The validation failure reason, if any, of the certificate.
NO_AVAILABLE_CONTACTS - This failure applies to email validation, which is not available for Lightsail certificates.

ADDITIONAL_VERIFICATION_REQUIRED - Lightsail requires additional information to process this certificate request. This can happen as a fraud-protection measure, such as when the domain ranks within the Alexa top 1000 websites. To provide the required information, use the Amazon Web Services Support Center to contact Amazon Web Services Support.

nested_items.name: inUseResourceCount
nested_items.description: The number of Lightsail resources that the certificate is attached to.

nested_items.name: keyAlgorithm
nested_items.description: The algorithm used to generate the key pair (the public and private key) of the certificate.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the certificate was created.

nested_items.name: issuedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the certificate was issued.

nested_items.name: issuerCA
nested_items.description: The certificate authority that issued the certificate.

nested_items.name: notBefore
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the certificate is first valid.

nested_items.name: notAfter
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the certificate expires.

nested_items.name: eligibleToRenew
nested_items.description: The renewal eligibility of the certificate.

nested_items.name: renewalSummary
nested_items.description: An object that describes the status of the certificate renewal managed by Lightsail.

nested_items.name: domainValidationRecords
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describe the domain validation records of the certificate.

nested_items.name: domainName
nested_items.description: The domain name of the certificate validation record. For example, example.com or www.example.com.

nested_items.name: resourceRecord
nested_items.description: An object that describes the DNS records to add to your domain's DNS to validate it for the certificate.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the record.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The DNS record type.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value for the DNS record.

nested_items.name: dnsRecordCreationState
nested_items.description: An object that describes the state of the canonical name (CNAME) records that are automatically added by Lightsail to the DNS of the domain to validate domain ownership.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The status code for the automated DNS record creation.
SUCCEEDED - The validation records were successfully added to the domain.
STARTED - The automatic DNS record creation has started.
FAILED - The validation records failed to be added to the domain.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The message that describes the reason for the status code.

nested_items.name: validationStatus
nested_items.description: The validation status of the record.

nested_items.name: renewalStatus
nested_items.description: The renewal status of the certificate.
PendingAutoRenewal - Lightsail is attempting to automatically validate the domain names of the certificate. No further action is required.

PendingValidation - Lightsail couldn't automatically validate one or more domain names of the certificate. You must take action to validate these domain names or the certificate won't be renewed. Check to make sure your certificate's domain validation records exist in your domain's DNS, and that your certificate remains in use.
Success - All domain names in the certificate are validated, and Lightsail renewed the certificate. No further action is required.
Failed - One or more domain names were not validated before the certificate expired, and Lightsail did not renew the certificate. You can request a new certificate using the CreateCertificate action.

nested_items.name: renewalStatusReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the renewal status of the certificate.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the certificate was last updated.

nested_items.name: revokedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the certificate was revoked. This value is present only when the certificate status is REVOKED.

nested_items.name: revocationReason
nested_items.description: The reason the certificate was revoked. This value is present only when the certificate status is REVOKED.

nested_items.name: tags
nested_items.description: The tag keys and optional values for the resource. For more information about tags in Lightsail, see the Amazon Lightsail Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: supportCode
nested_items.description: The support code. Include this code in your email to support when you have questions about your Lightsail certificate. This code enables our support team to look up your Lightsail information more easily.

nested_items.name: tags
nested_items.description: The tag keys and optional values for the resource. For more information about tags in Lightsail, see the Amazon Lightsail Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: nextPageToken
nested_items.description: If NextPageToken is returned there are more results available. The value of NextPageToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Make the call again using the returned token to retrieve the next page. Keep all other arguments unchanged.
